body.name: Nimbus Extra Soft Toothbrushes (Regular Size Head), Periodontist Design Tapered Bristles for Sensitive Teeth & Receding Gums (5 Pack, Colors May Vary)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 4 hrs 49 mins
features: EXTRA SOFT BRISTLES â The Nimbus Toothbrush uses Microfine Technology which utilizes two-levels of bristles to create unique softness and stability. The long single-end tapered fine bristles reach into areas not accessible to conventional bristles while the short end-rounded bristles are used to support and optimize plaque removal.

DURABLE â Nimbus bristles absorb less water which allows the brush to maintain its shape longer than standard Nylon bristles. Additionally, the bristles resist breakdown brought on from chemicals and natural mouth fluids which allows you to use Nimbus longer than average toothbrushes.

INVENTED BY PERIODONTIST â These toothbrushes were designed to create the safest brushing experience for teeth and gums while simultaneously providing highly efficient plaque removal on tooth surfaces. It has proven to be the best toothbrush for those with ultra-sensitive gums and teeth.

TESTED BY DENTIST â The Nimbus Microfine Technology has been evaluated by dental professionals. The consensus from testing the Nimbus brushes is this is the best brush you will ever use. The results speak for themselves.

5-PACK REGULAR SIZE â The Regular Nimbus utilizes a standard size brush head which is ideal to be used as an adult's everyday brush. This value pack comes equipped with 5 brushes, enough for each family member! Those who travel often can even set a few aside as designated travel brushes. The colors included in the pack may vary.
body.description: LOVE YOUR SMILE It's like a massage for your gums Hard bristles along with not properly cleaning your teeth can cause more harm than good, making your gums even more sensitive and damaged. Our pliable and ultra soft bristles are great for gums that are sensitive or inflamed. The long soft bristles are able to gently get into hard-to-reach crevices and gaps to remove the plaque build up. This is ideal for people with crowns, caps, implants, or gum recession that need an extra soft bristle to clean those sensitive areas. The Nimbus extra soft toothbrush is tender thanks to it's extra thin PBT fibers It effectively cleans the teeth and gums with it's 2 tiered design of densely arranged fibers You'll have access to all areas of the mouth due to our offers of different head sizes The square handle allows for the ideal 45 degree angle of cleaning

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The Nimbus Microfine Toothbrush is designed to be an efficient plaque remover without damaging your gums. The long extra soft tapered bristles are great for reaching hard-to-reach places, while the stiffer but soft shorter bristles help support effective plaque removal. Periodontists, dentists that specialize in gum health, recommend using toothbrushes with super soft bristles to protect your gums and prevent further harm and damage from occurring. Furthermore, if you're using a soft bristled brush, you will not avoid brushing along the gums. The gum line is where the most plaque accumulates, so it's important to find a brush that is gentle in cleaning this sensitive area. The gentle massaging also means you are stimulating your gums leading to better circulation which is beneficial for the entire tooth support system.

The Nimbus Microfine Toothbrush is designed to be an efficient plaque remover without damaging your gums. The long extra soft tapered bristles are great for reaching hard-to-reach places, while the stiffer but soft shorter bristles help support effective plaque removal. Periodontists, dentists that specialize in gum health, recommend using toothbrushes with super soft bristles to protect your gums and prevent further harm and damage from occurring. Furthermore, if you're using a soft bristled brush, you will not avoid brushing along the gums. The gum line is where the most plaque accumulates, so it's important to find a brush that is gentle in cleaning this sensitive area. The gentle massaging also means you are stimulating your gums leading to better circulation which is beneficial for the entire tooth support system.

Why Nimbus Toothbrushes? Nimbus was developed by Periodontist Dr. Stanley Klein. He specially designed and manufactures the bristles specifically for the Nimbus toothbrush so that you can take brushing your teeth to the next level. Periodontist Designed Family Friendly Microfine Technology Refreshing Feel LOVE YOUR SMILE It's like a massage for your gums Hard bristles along with not properly cleaning your teeth can cause more harm than good, making your gums even more sensitive and damaged. Our pliable and ultra soft bristles are great for gums that are sensitive or inflamed. The long soft bristles are able to gently get into hard-to-reach crevices and gaps to remove the plaque build up. This is ideal for people with crowns, caps, implants, or gum recession that need an extra soft bristle to clean those sensitive areas. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect in every way!
reviews.reviewText: The advice today from dental professionals is to use a soft toothbrush to minimize gum irritation leading to receding gums and the health problems which follow. I have tried many "soft" toothbrushes. Most were too hard and irritating. The others were too soft, and didn't do a thorough job of cleaning."Nimbus Extra Soft Toothbrushes With Tapered Bristles" is the answer. Very easy on the gums, the longer extra-soft bristles on the edges effectively & gently clean the gumline while the shorter soft bristles in the center effectively clean the teeth. Feels great while brushing, absolutely no irritation, my gums & teeth feel healthy & clean. An ingenious design, flawlessly executed. Also, the head size is just right, and the tapered angled handle reaches behind the teeth. Nicely fits the hand. And the materials, finish & quality is outstanding.I hope they continue to be available.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Supersoft brushes, well made, make toothbrushing a bit quicker and less annoying
reviews.reviewText: A dentist recommended these a couple years ago and I appreciate it! They are SO soft and clean very thoroughly. Feels more effective than typical "ultrasoft" brushes. Recently at a drugstore I saw a similar looking type of cloud toothbrush by a big manufacturer, ('Colgate Gum Health Extra Soft Toothbrush for Sensitive Gums with Deep Cleaning Floss-Tip Bristles' I think)- so I got those thinking it would be easier than ordering more of these. But on the first use of the Colgate bristles came loose!!! and got stuck in the back of my throat- it was scary. These Nimbus toothbrushes do NOT shed, and hold up very well for long use. Love them! Hold lightly, no need to scrub nor poke them into your gums. Thanks for making these!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for sensitive gums!
reviews.reviewText: This is the best soft bristle toothbrush I have tried! I've tried many other soft bristle toothbrushes, and this is the first that is soft, cleans well, and does not shed bristles. I have always brushed my teeth roughly and fast, and unfortunately, this has caused me to start having receding gums that are sensitive and end up bleeding. My dentist has told me it doesn't take much pressure to clean teeth well, and I've been trying to do this. I like my teeth to feel polished and super smooth, and this toothbrush does that for me. I catch myself brushing hard, and it doesn't cause any pain or bleeding. None of the toothbrushes advertised in the grocery store as sensitive and soft work for me. I have also used the many bristle toothbrushes off Amazon, but these always start shedding within a week or two. I hope this review helps someone and they give these toothbrushes a chance. These also come individually wrapped, which is excellent for keeping in my bathroom closet or bringing on a trip. I've used the yellow toothbrush in the photo for over a month, and it's holding up well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Experience Gentle and Effective Cleaning with Nimbus Extra Soft Toothbrushes
reviews.reviewText: The Nimbus Extra Soft Toothbrushes are an exceptional choice for those seeking a gentle yet effective oral care experience. With their soft bristles and ergonomic design, these toothbrushes provide a comfortable brushing experience while ensuring optimal cleaning for your teeth and gums.One of the standout features of the Nimbus Extra Soft Toothbrushes is their extra-soft bristles. Designed to be gentle on sensitive teeth and gums, these bristles effectively remove plaque and food particles without causing any discomfort. This makes the toothbrush ideal for individuals with sensitive gums, orthodontic appliances, or those recovering from dental procedures.The ergonomic design of the toothbrushes enhances their functionality. The handle is contoured to fit comfortably in the hand, providing a secure grip and precise control during brushing. This allows for easy maneuverability and ensures that every corner of the mouth can be reached effortlessly. Moreover, the compact head size enables easy access to those hard-to-reach areas, promoting thorough cleaning and maintaining optimal oral hygiene.In summary, the Nimbus Extra Soft Toothbrushes are a remarkable oral care option that combines comfort, effectiveness, and convenience. The extra-soft bristles offer a gentle brushing experience without compromising on cleanliness. The ergonomic design enhances control and maneuverability, making it easier to achieve comprehensive cleaning. If you are looking for a toothbrush that prioritizes both comfort and efficiency, the Nimbus Extra Soft Toothbrushes are an excellent choice to consider for your oral care routine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nimbus is a great toothbrush. I love the different colors so everyone know who's who. They are so gentle on you teeth and gums. I recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice and soft.
reviews.reviewText: Great toothbrushes for my sensitive teeth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are the finest toothbrushes I have ever used. They are the perfect firmness yet soft toothbrush that doesn’t irritate the gums and gets the job done.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Found our forever toothbrush!
reviews.reviewText: The reviews were really good, so I decided to give this brush a try as I was looking for very soft, but effective toothbrushes for both my husband and I. WOW, they are great brushes! We love them!Smooth and soft on the gums and teeth, but also does the job in getting teeth clean. I've already convinced my parents to switch over to the Nimbus too!
